Package ca.corefacility.gview.map.inputHandler

Provides for classes to handle different aspects of user input.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ExportImage A class used to export the current view of the map to an image.
ImageExportHandler  
InputEventHandler Handles keyboard and mouse events on the GView map.
LegendHandler  
MouseOverHandler Handles MouseOver events for items on the GView map.
PanEventHandler Handles pan events on the GView map.
SelectHandler Handles selection of specific items and features on the GView map.
ToolTipHandler Used to handle the tool-tip item that is displayed.
ZoomSubject Handles zooming in GView.
 

Package ca.corefacility.gview.map.inputHandler Description

Provides for classes to handle different aspects of user input.
